licence.p: The Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International (CC BY 4.0) Licence applies to this document.

This licence applies to this TEI-XML document which is the transformed result work from a previous LaTEX format file out of the variorum diplomatic edition of the complete poemes of Ausiàs March in all its witnesses.
The licence was added on May 1, 2023.

msIdentifier.repository: Biblioteca Virtual Lluís Vives - Cervantes Virtual

msItem.rubric: 133, centre, before first line{Mossen Ausias march}

editorialDecl.p: This a TEI-XML adaptation out of the LaTEX version of Ausiàs March's poems' variorum edition, from all witnesses.

lg.l: ¶ No so gosat endemanar merce
Hama dolor que del tot ma bandon
Un poch espay laprech de temps quem don
Ha poder dir lomal que dellam ue
E si mon cor ensa forca retorn
Y el torbament del entenjment pert
Pora saber quj damor no es cert
Yray amor com dins mj ancontorn
Si com lom cech no conex nit nj jorn
Si dels vehent ell noes aujsat
Diray amor nose qualma sobrat
Ajam aujs del qujm estan entorn
Yo desig molt quamorma bandonas
Car sola es lacausa demon mal
Mas de poder hira no te cabal
Quen contramor yo tant merebellas
E si remey ama dolor trobas
Ffora content car yon desig exir
Los vostres fets me fan auos auorir
E nos pot fer que abuos praticas
Mon partiment no puch ben acabar
En uos pensant estrany turment natench
E quant lestat demj saber mastrench
Ladonchs yo caych enmj pꝯ pus ignorar
No se remey potent mj consolar
Si altramor noua no conseguesch
Ho tu amor colp vell guarex abfresch
Ho de aquest me vulles bandonar
Veges mon cor enqujna dolor jau
En ton ostal no merex tan dur lit
Quj es lom viu don sies mils seruit
Tant es humil quesforc nol pot fer brau
Plagues adeu quabmj matex fes pau
Mi acordant abcor ferm alamort
Yo mir epens silmon acas tan fort
Com de amor e dira ser esclau
A fany te sats lom dos senyors seruent
Equant mes donchs essent ells enemichs
Quant hu complach laltres vers mj hinichs
Nose com bast complaurels egualment
Ho folla mor sies ver quel jouent
Es occasio detu amj forcar
Sibe lomon res tant no pot prechar
Vellessamplau que demals es sement
